snippet.title: Virtua Cop: Elite Edition (PS2) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A complete playthrough of Sega and Acclaim's 2002 PAL-only English release of the Sony PlayStation 2 light gun shooter compilation, Virtua Cop: Elite Edition.

I played through on the default Normal difficulty level, and unfortunately I ended up having to use the controller instead of the gun - as if VC wasn't hard enough to begin with. I say unfortunately, because I died a fair amount more than I really wanted to. I'd like to think that with the gun I'd have played better ;) Maybe, maybe not. 

This is pretty snazzy, it feels exactly the same as the original two arcade games, but the graphics are pretty nicely upgraded to the PS2's levels. The smoothing out of the graphics do lose a bit of the charm of the chunky originals, but it sure is smooth. 

___
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!
